com.cubeia.firebase.api.service.mttplayerreg
Interface TournamentPlayerRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
Contract
public interface TournamentPlayerRegistry
extends Contract

This object is for mapping players to tournament in the system state. Tournament are responsible for keeping this mapping up to date when the system starts, when players register/unregister or when a tournament is destroyed.

Author:
Larsan

Method Summary
 int[] getPlayersForTournament(int mttId)
          This method returns all players currently registered for a tournament.
 int[] getTournamentsForPlayer(int playerId)
          This method returns all tournaments a player is currently registered in.
 void register(int playerId, int mttId)
          Register a player in a tournament.
 void unregister(int playerId, int mttId)
          Unregister a player from a tournament.
 void unregisterAll(int mttId)
          Unregister all players from a tournament.
 

Method Detail

register

void register(int playerId,
              int mttId)
Register a player in a tournament. This method should be called when a player is registered or when the system starts and a tournament is populated from the backend.

Parameters:
playerId - Player to register
mttId - Tournament id

unregister

void unregister(int playerId,
                int mttId)
Unregister a player from a tournament. THis method should be called when a player is unregistered or leaves the tournament.

Parameters:
playerId - Player to unregister
mttId - Tournament id

unregisterAll

void unregisterAll(int mttId)
Unregister all players from a tournament. This method should be called when a tournament is destroyed.

Parameters:
mttId - Tournament id

getTournamentsForPlayer

int[] getTournamentsForPlayer(int playerId)
This method returns all tournaments a player is currently registered in. If the player is not found in the registry this method returns an empty array.

Parameters:
playerId - Player to get tournaments for
Returns:
All tournaments a player is registered for, or an empty array, never null

getPlayersForTournament

int[] getPlayersForTournament(int mttId)
This method returns all players currently registered for a tournament. If the tournament is not found in the registry this method returns an empty array.

Parameters:
mttId - Tournament to get players for
Returns:
All players registered for a tournament, or an empty array, never null
